Edmond.KOPX-TV: KOPX-TV, virtual channel 62 (UHF digital channel 50), is an Ion Television owned-and-operated television station licensed to Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, United States. Owned by Ion Media Networks, KOPX maintains offices, master control and transmitter facilities located at 13424 Railway Drive in north Oklahoma City. On cable, KOPX is carried on Cox Communications channel 17 in standard definition and digital channel 706 in high definition, and also carried by AT&T U-verse on channel 62 in standard definition.
